attributes.action: prevent the french coming anyware near the new aircraft carriers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Trafalgar. It is one of the most important events in our history, proving we are better thatn france, yet again. And now the french are trying to 'share' our new carriers because they cannot afford thier own. i am sick of the bloody french military - minimal effort to any war effort and expecting the british to help them out. these new carriers should be a focal point for british pride and give us all something to look to. god if i was king...

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
